Upgrades.name: Armor Piercing
Upgrades.Description: Increase penetration, allowing bullets to hit those behind the first target. Lower damage and fire speed than normal rounds.

Upgrades.name: High Explosive
Upgrades.Description: Explodes on impact, damaging everything nearby. Damage to surroundings is reduced to 25%.

Upgrades.name: Incendiary
Upgrades.Description: HE rounds from White Incorporate. Sets the target on fire. Deals percentage damage of full health.

Upgrades.name: Shotgun
Upgrades.Description: Shotgun firing mode from Windchaser. Deals more damage when target is closer.

Upgrades.name: Sharpnel
Upgrades.Description: Sharpnel firing mode from Windchaser. Deals more damage when target is further away.

Upgrades.name: Reloading System
Upgrades.Description: Advanced reloading system from Precision Interstellar. Increases attack speed of all turrets.

Upgrades.name: Composite Barrel
Upgrades.Description: Advanced Gun Barrels from Precision Interstellar. Increases attack range of all turrets.

Upgrades.name: Targetting Computers
Upgrades.Description: Improved target acquisition system from A.A.I. Increases the chance to land a critical strike, dealing double damage.

Upgrades.name: Explosive Reactive Armour
Upgrades.Description: Install Shield inc. ERA system on all structures, increasing their HP by 50 percent.

Upgrades.name: Drone Assisted Repair
Upgrades.Description: Repair services provided by Beehive. Increases speed of repairs.

Upgrades.name: Drone Assisted Construction
Upgrades.Description: Allows construction of barricades. Provided by Beehive.

Upgrades.name: Tar Shells
Upgrades.Description: Call in artillery barrage of Tar shells from White Incorporate, making a field of tar that slows down units.

Upgrades.name: Breach Charge
Upgrades.Description: Powerful charges from White Incorporate that allows removing map features.

Upgrades.name: Close Air Support
Upgrades.Description: Air security services provided by Falcon Aero. Call in combat drones that attack enemies within a zone.

Upgrades.name: Drone Assisted Logistics
Upgrades.Description: Call in Beehive logistics robots to set up a temporary network tower anywhere on the map.

Upgrades.name: Exo-dimentional Matter
Upgrades.Description: Exotic matter rounds that tear space-time. Randomizes target's position and Health.
